oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter written by Stephen and Clarky O'Daniel
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Written to "daughter" and signed by Stephen and Calrky O'Daniel, the letter discusses health and the daughter's decision to join the church. The authors went as far as to encourage the daughter to "take a cool and calm reflection on that matter [;] be shore [sure] to think for yourself and act wisely [;] be not decieved by persuasion [;] & and if it is your will to join the Church [sic] we have no objection [.]"
